alert.note: Alert for Dallam; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 3:51PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Sherman, southeastern Dallam and northeastern Hartley Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 351 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles west of Hartley, or 12 miles south of Dalhart, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dalhart and Hartley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
